error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'initial_width' (value: 18) was used instead of 'new_length' (value: 15).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 2160
He increases the length to 13+2=<<13+2=15>>15 feet
He increases the width to 18+2=<<18+2=20>>20 feet
So the rooms are 18*20=<<18*20=360>>360 square feet
So he has 1+3=<<1+3=4>>4 rooms of this size
So he has 4*360=<<4*360=1440>>1440 square feet of rooms this size
He also has one room of size 360*2=<<360*2=720>>720 square feet
So he has 1440+720=<<1440+720=2160>>2160 square feet of rooms
